content: round 11 4sc 1sc into the chain 19sc 1sc into the chain 3sc 28 note if you want to use small safety eyes instead of 16 17 18 beads or embroidery add them now round 12 inv decrease 2sc repeat 7 times 21 round 13 1sc inv decrease repeat 7 times 14 poke up the eye stitches the 5dc on round 3 and add toy stuffing img 15 round 14 inv decrease 7 times 7 19 20 21 fasten_off pick up all the front loops with a tapestry needle and pull tight to close img 16-17 use the same yarn tail to sew down the feet folding the longer legs and sewing down the toes and securing the arms on an angle towards the tummy img 18 22 23 24 use a tail of light yellow to embroider the eyes making horizontal stitches over the double_crochet stitches of round 3 to create an oval shape img 19-20 then use the black embroidery thread to make an horizontal stitch in the middle img 21 with the same yarn tail to add a little mouth too note you can embroider the eyes in a different way or use black beads make the mouth pointing upward downward or asymmetrical pick the style that fits your tiny frog mood use a tail of lilac to embroider two little cheeks below the eyes to complete the work img 122-23 optional add some speckles on the back making short straight stitches and/or french knots using light yellow and light green yarn img 24 share your work in progress on instagram using #amigurumischoolofmagic5 or in the dedicated ravelry thread this crochet pattern is part of the amigurumi school of magic 5 by airali design and irene strange 3 this pdf is strictly for personal non-commercial use copy distribution or commercial use of this pattern or any of its parts are not allowed for any information contact amigurumiadvent@gmail com join us in a 5-part mystery crochet-along by airali design and
